useReferenceInfo: This option allows to use the reference mechanism for translating form fields. These translations should be prepared accordingly on the service side that handles the given form.
label: Label
defaultValueInfo: The default value of the field that will be set when the user does not enter any value. Text values should be provided in quotes, e.g. 'text'. Numeric values should be provided without quotes, e.g. 123. Complex values such as objects or arrays should be provided in JSON format
readonlyExpressionInfo: You can define a JSONATA expression for the readonly property that controls whether this field is editable. Open the advanced editor for more complex expressions.
hideInfo: If checked, the form field will be hidden (not visible to the user) but expressions, calculations, or other auxiliary operations will still be executed.
hideInfoExpression: Use an expression to determine when the form field should be hidden (not visible to the user). The expression should return a true or false value
ifPropertyInfo: You can define a JSONATA condition that controls the visibility (rendering) of this element or open the advanced editor for more complex expressions.
cellClassProperty: CSS Style Classes for the field
cellClassInfo: For each field, you can pass additional CSS classes from the Vuetify library. Classes should be space-separated.
fillRowInfo: If checked, the element will fill the entire available space in the row. The next element will be moved to a new row.
calculationInfo: Define a JSONata expression to calculate the value of this field based on other fields.
title: Title mapping
urlErrorMessage: The address you entered is incorrect
returnObjectTooltip: If this option is enabled, the entire object will be saved in the form model, containing for example the identifier and label. If the option is disabled, only the valueMapping defined in the dictionary URL will be saved.
autoSelectTooltip: If this option is enabled, the system activates the automatic value selection mechanism for dictionary fields in the form. When the returned list of elements contains only one item, the field will be auto-filled with that value. Enabling this option is recommended to accelerate filtering and searching capabilities in the form
multipleTooltip: If this option is enabled, the system saves an array of values in the form.
addDisabledCondition: Click to define a disabled condition

simpleSource.returnObjectTooltip: If enabled, the entire object containing, for example, the identifier and label will be saved in the form model.
simpleSource.label: Label
simpleSource.addDisabledCondition: Click to define a disabled condition
